thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris Vendome Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, helpful staff, warm accommodations
thread.title_full: Great location, helpful staff, warm accommodations - Review of Renaissance Paris Vendome Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LizLawyer8162
title: Great location, helpful staff, warm accommodations
text: Very nice small hotel in the 1st arondissement. Located near Place Vendome, Tuileries, Rue di Rivoli, and other sites. Friendly, warm staff. Spend a long weekend celebrating a birthday and upon arrival, a lovely bottle of champagne awaited. Staff also assisted a friend in the US arrange to have chocolates there as well as a birthday gift. Quiet street, very safe. Would definitely return again.
